metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39289 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television softwareapplication. In affected versions the ZoneMinder API Exposes Database Logcontents to user without privileges, allows insertion, modification,deletion of logs without System Privileges. Users are advised yo upgrade assoon as possible. Users unable to upgrade should disable database logging.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
